Mike Pence ruled out a White House bid in a letter sent to supporters that also fueled speculation he is instead planning a run for governor. We have been especially humbled by the confidence and support of those who believe we should pursue the presidency, but after much deliberation and prayer, we believe our calling is closer to home, Mike Pence wrote in the letter.`` In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana.'' Eric Schmidt drew fire for responding to a hypothetical question posed at a forum in Washington, D.C., about an implant that would let Google Inc. know what its users were thinking. He responded that Google Inc. 's policy is to get right up to the creepy line and not cross it, and an implant would cross the line. He also said that as users voluntarily share information online, it doesn't need users to type in search queries for the company to tailor the results.``

A billion browser-based phones also means that Google can display advertisements to that many more people around the world. Already, even without achieving each of those developments, interesting services are available, Eric Schmidt said. We are at the point where, between the geolocation capability of the phone and the power of the phone's browser platform, it is possible to deliver personalized information about where you are, what you could do there right now, and so forth-- and to deliver such a service at scale, Eric Schmidt wrote. Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future, said Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer , in a statement. Satya Nadella replaces Microsoft veteran Bob Muglia as head of the highly profitable server business. Steve Ballmer took the unusual step in January of publicly announcing that he thought Muglia

change the world again with our next generation application development and cloud platform, and I feel fortunate to be part of this transformation,'' Satya Nadella wrote in a Feb. 9 e-mail to Server and Tools Business employees. Today we are seeing our existing customers move to the cloud to address issues of cost and complexity; tomorrow, our work as leaders in innovation will result in new scenarios and workloads... enabled in the cloud. Back in January, Steve Ballmer announced that Muglia's departure would herald the Server and Tools Business'`` move forward into the era of cloud computing,'' one that would apparently require`` new leadership.
